column5:
You are not alone. I was molested in the navy by my chief. It haunts me every day, but.... I know this is not my sentence.  It's his. I am a normal person that bad things happend to at the hands of a demented person.  He will always remember how fucked up he is raping people.  It's not your fault.

Peace
Mr C

Sorry your in pain.  I totally get that. I too am in pain.  They say I cant take anything.  I try to focus on my breathing to realize I am.  I dont have alot of fancy words to save you. But I would like you to know you are not alone..

Peace
Mr C
